author: Doug Bostrom
content:
Nice.

Good that the original text is archived here and elsewhere.

Something that seems to continue eluding our full collective cognition: a President who feverishly promoted the “birther” myth established and cemented his own history of tapping into instincts entirely different than what the letter describes, enthusiastically and arguably even maniacally. A more xenophobic appeal more energetically pursued is hard to imagine. The man has described himself to us with perfect accuracy.
